snippet: It's not a billion-dollar buyout, but one Internet deal struck by the Blackstone Group may still pay off. The firm recently bought "blackstonesucks.com," "stephenschwarzmansucks.com," and at least five other domain names, presumably to keep them out...
abstract: It's not a billion-dollar buyout, but one Internet deal struck by the Blackstone Group may still pay off. The firm recently bought "blackstonesucks.com," "stephenschwarzmansucks.com," and at least five other domain names, presumably to keep them out of the hands of antagonists who might use them to embarrass the firm, reports Domain Name Wire.
lead_paragraph: It's not a billion-dollar buyout, but one Internet deal struck by the Blackstone Group may still pay off. The firm recently bought "blackstonesucks.com," "stephenschwarzmansucks.com," and at least five other domain names, presumably to keep them out of the hands of antagonists who might use them to embarrass the firm, reports Domain Name Wire. Read more »

headline.main: On the Web, Schwarzman Plays Defense
